messageBody:
hi all:
I am new user to junit . there is a question confuse me. Whether i must write testcode for a method without return value. If it is necessary ,how to write ? Thanks you.
for example:
public class Demo1
{
private String strName;
public void setName(String str)
{
strName = str;
}
......
}
whether i must use junit to test setName function.
best regards
penpals
